channel.title: Tangath toborn on Chaotic Online
channel.description: Recent content in Tangath toborn on Chaotic Online

item.title: Battle Lessons
item.description: In this episode Tom gets to know more about the main event in Chaotic: The CodeMasters Matches!

item.title: Blight Fight
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet Garv, the OverWorld Caretaker in charge of Lake Morn, helping Tom (and Smildon) to heal the Prexxor Chasm from the Blight instead of fighting it by brute-force

item.title: Buggin' Out
item.description: In this episode we’ll know another of the four Tribes in Chaotic, the Danians, a Tribe formed by insects of all kinds that take the safety of their domains seriously, especially when it comes to Chaotic players.

item.title: Chaor's Commandos (Part 1)
item.description: In this episode we’ll see an elite squad led by Chaor in a bold raid on Kiru City towards the Overworld Arsenal

item.title: Chaor's Commandos (Part 2)
item.description: In the continuation of the previous episode we’ll see Chaor’s invasion to the Overworld Arsenal in Kiru City

item.title: Chaotic Crisis
item.description: In this episode, the Creatures of Chaotic invade Earth! Let’s get Chaotic… for our planet!

item.title: Chasm Quest
item.description: In this episode Tom finally decides to explore the Prexxor Chasm, in Perim, from the scan he got from CodeMaster Crellan until he realizes that something is really wrong.

item.title: Fighting Friendly (Season Finale)
item.description: In this episode… the end! Of the season, of a promising career and of a long time friendship…

item.title: Fire Fighters
item.description: In this episode we’ll see a hot fight, literally, in which both players will try to prove their own superiority as well as of one of of the Four Elements.

item.title: Glacier Plains
item.description: Glacier Plains is a region on the north-easternmost part of the OverWorld.

item.title: Going Under
item.description: In this episode we’ll see a small part of one of the most known teachings of Sun Tzu’s The Art of War in Chaotic: Know your enemy!

item.title: Hotekk's Challenge (Part 1)
item.description: In this episode, Tom wins the seventh battle in the Hotekk Drome, and thus is challenged by the CodeMaster himself

item.title: Last Stand (Part 1)
item.description: In this episode, the beginning of the end… the battle for Perim is now!

item.title: Last Stand (Part 2)
item.description: In this episode, the battle continues in different regions of Perim at once… and in the Tribal Alliance itself as well

item.title: Legions of Aa'une (Season Finale)
item.description: In this episode, the battle continues with overturns and some shifting… and the end!

item.title: Maxxor
item.description: Maxxor is an OverWorld Hero and ruler of the OverWorld Tribe

item.title: Mega Match
item.description: In this episode we’ll see the internal competition between Kaz and Peyton to see who is the best Chaotic player get to a next level… only now it’s up to Tom

item.title: Putting the Muge in Mugic
item.description: In this episode we’ll have a common (and unnecessary) territorial war complete with treason, sabotage, counter-espionage and lessons of leadership between OverWorlders and Mipedians

item.title: Scavenger Scan
item.description: In this episode we’ll see Kaz and Peyton competing with each other (again) to see who is the best player of Chaotic between them.

item.title: Shifting Sands
item.description: In this episode Peyton shows to Tom that not all of the Mipedians are cruel and pitiless as those he met while rescuing Reggie.

item.title: Son of the Spiritlands
item.description: In this episode, an indestructible Creature from the Spiritlands threatens to destroy the whole Perim unless Tangath Toborn faces him.

item.title: Tale of Two Toms
item.description: In this episode an easy-going version of our protagonist comes into play and, thanks to an evil pushing, ends up in a fight, in the best Chaotic style

item.title: The CodeMaster Chronicles (Part 1)
item.description: In this episode we’ll see the first part of the most amazing match in Chaotic: The battle between Tom Majors and the CodeMaster Crellan!

item.title: The Thing About Bodal
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet Bodal, a Creature very talkative, annoying and cocky about himself. We’ll also see the most improbable of all fights in Chaotic.

item.title: Trading Cards
item.description: In this episode we’ll see a card trading chain engineered by Sarah so she could have the scan of rare Mugic. Of course our gentlemen wouldn’t let her down… right?

item.title: Triple Threat
item.description: In this episode we’ll see the Tribal Alliance overcoming its cultural differences so they united may have a chance against the M’arrillians

item.title: War Beasts
item.description: In this episode, after a while without mess with other players, Krystella and Klay set up for Peyton to get the scan of a War Beast, a humongous Mipedian titan as powerful as lunatic and, apparently, uncontrollable
